attributes.action: Refund excess voluntary class 3 national insurance prior to 2006
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many people paid voluntary class 3 national insurance contributions to boost their state pension (some had to take early retirement due to ill health) even though they already had 30 qualifying years and now find the rules changed half way through the game and only post 2006 contributions to be refunded.
This is unacceptable and unreasonable.
